pullrequest.title: Support generating dat file for the visibility range communication model

content.raw:
I’ve also tested this with my simple cave world, and it appears to correctly generate the dat file.

The only thing that was unexpected is that the `dat` file is generated in the `install` directory if you are using colcon.  That may not be the case with other build tools, though.
content.html:
I’ve also tested this with my simple cave world, and it appears to correctly generate the dat file.

The only thing that was unexpected is that the dat file is generated in the install directory if you are using colcon. That may not be the case with other build tools, though.
